name: Halloween Craft 3D
description:
Halloween Craft 3D is a hardcore survival game with a top down view set in a halloween-styled, voxel environment.

Let’s start our survival adventure! Your goal here is to collect resources, craft tools, weapons, and shelter, and survive as long as possible.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the left controller to move a character. Use the right button for every attack.

Game features:
- offline survival game
- halloween theme
- voxel art
- halloween app free

Create your own world, organize your needs and protect yourself from external threats with Halloween Survival Craft! Good luck!
